recipes.name: Classic Margherita Pizza
instructions: Preheat oven to 475Â°F (245Â°C)
Roll out pizza dough on floured surface
Spread tomato sauce evenly over dough
Add torn mozzarella pieces
Drizzle with olive oil
Bake for 10-12 minutes until golden
Add fresh basil leaves and serve

recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti until al dente
Fry pancetta until crisp
Whisk eggs and cheese together
Drain pasta and mix with pancetta
Remove from heat and stir in egg mixture quickly
Season with black pepper and serve

recipes.name: Lasagna alla Bolognese
instructions: Cook beef and mix with tomato sauce
Boil lasagna noodles until soft
Layer noodles, meat sauce, ricotta, and mozzarella
Repeat layers and top with Parmesan
Bake at 375Â°F (190Â°C) for 45 minutes
Let rest 10 minutes before serving

recipes.name: Risotto alla Milanese
instructions: SautÃ© onion in butter
Add rice and toast for 2 minutes
Add broth gradually while stirring
Add saffron halfway through cooking
Cook until creamy and tender
Stir in Parmesan and serve

recipes.name: Penne all'Arrabbiata
instructions: Cook penne until al dente
SautÃ© garlic and chili flakes in olive oil
Add tomato sauce and simmer for 10 minutes
Mix in cooked pasta and toss well
Garnish with parsley and serve

recipes.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
instructions: Cook fettuccine until al dente
Melt butter and add cream in a pan
Stir in Parmesan until melted
Add cooked pasta and toss to coat
Season with black pepper and serve

recipes.name: Gnocchi al Pesto
instructions: Boil gnocchi until they float
Drain and mix with pesto
Top with Parmesan and pine nuts
Serve immediately

recipes.name: Osso Buco alla Milanese
instructions: Dredge veal shanks in flour and brown in oil and butter
Remove meat, sautÃ© onion, carrot, and celery
Add tomato paste, wine, and broth, return meat to pot
Simmer covered for 2 hours until tender
Serve with gremolata and risotto

recipes.name: Polenta e Funghi
instructions: Cook polenta in broth until thick and creamy
SautÃ© mushrooms and garlic in olive oil
Serve mushrooms over polenta, garnish with parsley

recipes.name: Saltimbocca alla Romana
instructions: Top each veal cutlet with prosciutto and sage, secure with toothpick
SautÃ© in butter and oil until golden
Add wine and simmer until reduced
Serve hot

recipes.name: Pasta e Fagioli
instructions: SautÃ© onion, carrot, and celery in olive oil
Add beans, tomato, and broth, simmer 20 minutes
Add pasta and cook until tender
Season and serve

recipes.name: Arancini di Riso
instructions: Form risotto into balls, stuff with mozzarella and ham
Roll in flour, dip in egg, coat with breadcrumbs
Deep fry until golden brown
Drain and serve hot

recipes.name: Caponata Siciliana
instructions: Cube and fry eggplant, set aside
SautÃ© onion, celery, and tomato
Add olives, capers, vinegar, and sugar
Return eggplant, simmer 10 minutes
Serve warm or cold

recipes.name: Panzanella Toscana
instructions: Soak bread in water, squeeze dry
Chop vegetables and combine with bread
Dress with oil and vinegar, toss with basil
Chill before serving

recipes.name: Tiramisu
instructions: Whisk egg yolks and sugar, fold in mascarpone
Dip ladyfingers in espresso, layer with mascarpone mixture
Repeat layers, dust with cocoa powder
Chill for 4 hours before serving

recipes.name: Bruschetta al Pomodoro
instructions: Toast baguette slices
Rub with garlic
Top with diced tomatoes, basil, oil, salt, and pepper
Serve immediately

recipes.name: Parmigiana di Melanzane
instructions: Slice and salt eggplant, let drain 30 min
Fry eggplant in olive oil
Layer eggplant, tomato sauce, mozzarella, and Parmesan
Repeat layers, top with basil
Bake at 375Â°F (190Â°C) for 30 min

recipes.name: Pasta alla Norma
instructions: Fry eggplant cubes in olive oil
Cook pasta, toss with tomato sauce and garlic
Add eggplant, top with ricotta salata and basil

recipes.name: Vitello Tonnato
instructions: Roast veal with wine, cool and slice thin
Blend tuna, mayo, capers, anchovy, lemon juice
Spread sauce over veal slices, chill before serving

recipes.name: Cacciucco (Tuscan Fish Stew)
instructions: SautÃ© garlic and chili in oil
Add tomato and wine, simmer
Add fish and squid, cook until tender
Serve with toasted bread

recipes.name: Pasta al Pesto Genovese
instructions: Boil pasta, potato, and green beans together
Drain and toss with pesto and Parmesan

recipes.name: SupplÃ¬ al Telefono
instructions: Form risotto into balls, stuff with mozzarella
Dip in egg, coat with breadcrumbs
Deep fry until golden brown

recipes.name: Crostini Toscani
instructions: SautÃ© onion and livers in butter
Add capers and anchovy, blend to a paste
Spread on toasted baguette slices

recipes.name: Pasta e Ceci
instructions: SautÃ© garlic and rosemary in oil
Add chickpeas and tomato, simmer
Add pasta and cook until tender

recipes.name: Frittata di Zucchine
instructions: Slice zucchini and sautÃ© in oil
Beat eggs with Parmesan, salt, and pepper
Add zucchini, cook until set

recipes.name: Pasta con le Sarde
instructions: SautÃ© fennel in oil, add sardines, pine nuts, and raisins
Cook pasta, toss with sauce, top with breadcrumbs

recipes.name: Pollo alla Cacciatora
instructions: Brown chicken in oil, remove
SautÃ© vegetables, add wine and tomato
Return chicken, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Panzarotti Pugliesi
instructions: Roll dough, fill with sauce, mozzarella, and ham
Fold and seal, deep fry until golden

recipes.name: Ribollita Toscana
instructions: Cook beans and vegetables in water
Add bread, simmer until thick
Drizzle with olive oil before serving

recipes.name: Torta della Nonna
instructions: Make pastry dough, chill
Prepare custard with milk, eggs, sugar, and zest
Fill pastry, top with pine nuts, bake until golden

recipes.name: Crespelle alla Fiorentina
instructions: Make crepes with flour, eggs, and milk
Fill with spinach and ricotta, roll up
Top with tomato sauce and Parmesan, bake

recipes.name: BaccalÃ  alla Vicentina
instructions: Soak cod, dredge in flour, brown in oil
Layer with onion and anchovy, cover with milk
Simmer gently for 3 hours, garnish with parsley

recipes.name: Pasta alla Gricia
instructions: Cook guanciale until crisp
Cook pasta, toss with guanciale and fat
Add cheese and pepper, toss well

recipes.name: Torta Caprese
instructions: Melt chocolate and butter, mix with sugar and eggs
Fold in almond flour, bake at 350Â°F (175Â°C) for 40 min

recipes.name: Insalata di Mare
instructions: Boil seafood, drain and cool
Toss with lemon, oil, parsley, and celery
Chill before serving

recipes.name: Pasta al Forno
instructions: Cook pasta, mix with sauce, beef, and eggs
Layer with mozzarella and Parmesan, bake at 375Â°F (190Â°C) for 30 min

recipes.name: Pasta alla Puttanesca
instructions: SautÃ© garlic and anchovy in oil
Add tomato, olives, and capers, simmer
Toss with cooked spaghetti

recipes.name: Gamberi alla Busara
instructions: SautÃ© garlic in oil, add shrimp
Add tomato and wine, simmer until shrimp are cooked
Garnish with parsley

recipes.name: Cozze alla Tarantina
instructions: SautÃ© garlic and chili in oil
Add tomato, cook until soft
Add mussels, cover and steam until open
Garnish with parsley

recipes.name: Pasta al Limone
instructions: Cook pasta, reserve some water
Melt butter, add cream, lemon zest, and cheese
Toss with pasta and pepper

recipes.name: Focaccia Genovese
instructions: Mix flour, water, yeast, and salt, knead dough
Let rise, spread in pan, dimple surface
Drizzle with oil, bake at 425Â°F (220Â°C) for 25 min

recipes.name: Pasta e Patate
instructions: SautÃ© vegetables in oil, add water and potatoes
Add pasta, cook until tender, top with Parmesan

recipes.name: Sgombro alla Griglia
instructions: Brush mackerel with oil, season with salt and pepper
Grill until cooked, serve with lemon and parsley

recipes.name: Pasta con i Broccoli
instructions: Boil pasta and broccoli together
SautÃ© garlic and chili in oil, toss with pasta and broccoli

recipes.name: Polpette al Sugo
instructions: Mix beef, breadcrumbs, eggs, cheese, and parsley
Form balls, brown in oil, simmer in tomato sauce

recipes.name: Risotto ai Frutti di Mare
instructions: SautÃ© garlic in oil, add rice, toast
Add stock gradually, stir in seafood and tomato
Cook until creamy, garnish with parsley

recipes.name: Cacciatore di Coniglio
instructions: Brown rabbit in oil, remove
SautÃ© vegetables, add wine and tomato
Return rabbit, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Pasta alla Zozzona
instructions: Brown sausage and pancetta, add tomato sauce
Cook pasta, toss with sauce, stir in eggs and cheese

recipes.name: Torta Pasqualina
instructions: Line pan with pastry, fill with spinach, ricotta, and eggs
Top with more pastry, bake at 375Â°F (190Â°C) for 45 min

recipes.name: Pasta alla Nerano
instructions: Fry zucchini in oil, set aside
Cook pasta, toss with zucchini, cheese, and basil

recipes.name: Cacciucco Livornese
instructions: SautÃ© garlic and chili in oil
Add tomato and wine, simmer
Add fish and squid, cook until tender
Serve with toasted bread

recipes.name: Pasta con le Vongole
instructions: SautÃ© garlic in oil, add clams and wine
Cover and steam until clams open
Toss with cooked spaghetti and parsley

recipes.name: Frittelle di Zucchine
instructions: Grate zucchini, mix with flour, eggs, cheese, and salt
Fry spoonfuls in oil until golden

recipes.name: Pasta alla Boscaiola
instructions: Brown sausage and mushrooms, add tomato sauce and cream
Cook pasta, toss with sauce, garnish with parsley

recipes.name: Caponata di Carciofi
instructions: Clean and slice artichokes, sautÃ© with onion
Add tomato, olives, capers, vinegar, and sugar
Simmer until tender

recipes.name: Pasta alla Sorrentina
instructions: Boil gnocchi, drain
Mix with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and basil
Bake until cheese is melted, top with Parmesan

recipes.name: Pasta alla Carrettiera
instructions: Cook spaghetti, toss with garlic, parsley, chili, and oil
Top with toasted breadcrumbs

recipes.name: Pasta alla Trapanese
instructions: Blend almonds, tomato, basil, garlic, and oil to make pesto
Toss with cooked pasta

recipes.name: Pasta alla Grattata
instructions: Cook pasta, toss with butter, yolks, cheese, and pepper

recipes.name: Pasta con i Piselli
instructions: SautÃ© onion in oil, add peas, cook until soft
Add pasta, cook until tender, top with Parmesan

recipes.name: Pasta alla Genovese (Neapolitan)
instructions: Brown beef, add vegetables and wine, simmer 2 hours
Cook pasta, toss with sauce and Parmesan

recipes.name: Pasta con le Sarde e Finocchietto
instructions: SautÃ© fennel in oil, add sardines, pine nuts, and raisins
Cook pasta, toss with sauce, top with breadcrumbs

recipes.name: Pasta alla Papalina
instructions: Cook pasta, toss with ham, peas, eggs, cheese, and butter

recipes.name: Pasta alla Norcina
instructions: Brown sausage, add cream, toss with pasta and cheese

recipes.name: Pasta alla Lucana
instructions: Brown sausage and pepper, add tomato sauce
Cook pasta, toss with sauce and cheese

recipes.name: Pasta alla Campidanese
instructions: Brown sausage, add tomato sauce and saffron
Cook pasta, toss with sauce and cheese

recipes.name: Pasta alla Calabrese
instructions: SautÃ© onion, add nduja and tomato sauce
Cook pasta, toss with sauce and cheese

recipes.name: Pasta alla Siciliana
instructions: Fry eggplant, add tomato sauce, toss with pasta
Top with ricotta salata and basil

recipes.name: Pasta alla Romana
instructions: Cook pancetta, toss with pasta, eggs, cheese, and pepper

recipes.name: Pasta alla Barese
instructions: Boil pasta and broccoli rabe together
SautÃ© garlic and chili in oil, toss with pasta and broccoli rabe

recipes.name: Pasta alla Napoletana
instructions: SautÃ© garlic in oil, add tomato sauce, simmer
Toss with pasta and basil

recipes.name: Pasta alla Pugliese
instructions: Boil pasta and turnip greens together
SautÃ© garlic and chili in oil, toss with pasta and greens

recipes.name: Pasta alla Sarda
instructions: SautÃ© garlic in oil, add clams, cover and steam
Toss with cooked pasta and parsley

recipes.name: Pasta alla Valdostana
instructions: Cook pasta, toss with cheese, ham, cream, and butter

recipes.name: Pasta alla Friulana
instructions: Cook pasta, toss with speck, cream, cheese, and chives

recipes.name: Pasta alla Veneta
instructions: Cook pasta, toss with duck ragÃ¹, cheese, and pepper

recipes.name: Pasta alla Marchigiana
instructions: Cook pasta, toss with livers, sauce, cheese, and butter

recipes.name: Pasta alla Abruzzese
instructions: Cook pasta, toss with lamb ragÃ¹, cheese, and pepper

recipes.name: Pasta alla Molise
instructions: Brown sausage, add garlic and broccoli rabe
Cook pasta, toss with sausage and vegetables

recipes.name: Pasta alla Umbra
instructions: SautÃ© mushrooms and garlic in oil
Cook pasta, toss with mushrooms and parsley

recipes.name: Pasta alla Ferrarese
instructions: Fill pasta with pumpkin, cook, toss with butter, cheese, and nutmeg

recipes.name: Pasta alla Piacentina
instructions: Fill pasta with ricotta and spinach, cook, toss with butter and cheese

recipes.name: Pasta alla Mantovana
instructions: Fill pasta with pumpkin and amaretti, cook, toss with butter and cheese

recipes.name: Pasta alla Bergamasca
instructions: Fill pasta, cook, toss with pancetta, butter, and cheese

recipes.name: Pasta alla Piemontese
instructions: Cook pasta, toss with butter, truffle, and cheese

recipes.name: Pasta alla Valdostana (Pizzoccheri)
instructions: Boil pasta, cabbage, and potato together, toss with cheese and butter

recipes.name: Pasta alla Liguria
instructions: Boil pasta, beans, and potato together, toss with pesto

recipes.name: Pasta alla Trentina
instructions: Cook pasta, toss with speck, cream, and chives

recipes.name: Pasta alla Friuli-Venezia Giulia
instructions: Cook gnocchi, toss with butter, ricotta, and sage

recipes.name: Pasta alla Basilicata
instructions: Cook pasta, toss with breadcrumbs, pepper, garlic, and oil

recipes.name: Pasta alla Calabria
instructions: SautÃ© onion, add nduja and tomato sauce
Cook pasta, toss with sauce and cheese

recipes.name: Pasta alla Sicilia
instructions: Cook pasta, toss with pesto, tomato, and almonds

recipes.name: Pasta alla Sardegna
instructions: Brown sausage, add tomato sauce and saffron
Cook pasta, toss with sauce and cheese

recipes.name: Pasta alla Campania
instructions: SautÃ© garlic in oil, add seafood and tomato, cook
Toss with pasta and parsley

recipes.name: Pasta alla Lazio
instructions: Cook guanciale until crisp, toss with pasta, cheese, and pepper

recipes.name: Pasta alla Marche
instructions: Cook pasta, toss with livers, sauce, cheese, and butter

recipes.name: Pasta alla Abruzzo
instructions: Cook pasta, toss with lamb ragÃ¹, cheese, and pepper

recipes.name: Pasta alla Trentino-Alto Adige
instructions: Cook pasta, toss with speck, cream, and chives

recipes.name: Pasta alla Valle d'Aosta
instructions: Cook pasta, toss with cheese, ham, cream, and butter

recipes.name: Pasta alla Veneto
instructions: Cook pasta, toss with duck ragÃ¹, cheese, and pepper
